resources.string: you\'re a new face, welcome to the party!
what shall I call you from now on?
dashboard is a cm theme engine addon by chummy development team that allows you to expand the possibilities of all cdt themes, as well as extras for other themes as well.
dashboard comes with a built in color picker for hotswapping of colors!\nplease allow it to automatically download a small patch file for itself before you leave your internet connection.
dashboard also comes with a built in notification header swapper to customize your phone further without the use of useless xposed plugins or making a theme yourself!
dashboard also comes with built in theme utilities to offer you a plethora of options to help you fix your layers directly on your phone!\n\n
to use all the functions of the app, your phone must definitely have root enabled, as well as a custom rom flashed if you would like to have a notification header!
please read everything that pops up while you use this app. crucial information to prevent you from bootlooping such as soft rebooting after setting an action is key!
File chosen was not a valid ZIP!
you have downloaded all available header packs\n\nif you would like to clear your dashboard downloads folder, click the overflow menu and select "delete dashboard. folder and restart".
the back button will now automatically close out and relaunch the application with your newly downloaded header packs in the correct spinners.

string-array.name: dialog_responses
string-array.item: Sprinkling some magic over here…and over there…
ERROR L337: Program terminated with errors....jk.
I hope you did your reading, because you need to get ready for the amount of awesomeness!
I hope you don\'t have to report bugs…please no.
I don\'t have a library card, but do you mind if I check you out?
I seem to have lost my phone number. Can I have yours?
Are you religious? Because you\'re the answer to all my prayers.
Did you sit in a pile of sugar? Cause you have a pretty sweet ass.
Do you live in a corn field, cause I\'m stalking you.
You look cold. Want to use me as a blanket?
Can I take your picture to prove to all my friends that angels do exist?
My doctor says I\'m lacking Vitamin U.
If I were a cat I\'d spend all 9 lives with you.
Are you ready for some…fun?
I\’ll treat you like my homework: Slam you on the table and do you all night long!
You know why I am like a squirrel? Cause I want to bury my nuts in you.
You are hotter than the bottom of my laptop.
Do you have a Band-Aid? Because I just scraped my knee falling for you.
Do you know what my shirt is made of? @android:style/Theme.Material.
Did you invent the airplane? Cause you seem Wright for me.
If God made anything more beautiful than you, I\'m sure he\'d keep it for himself.
Do you have a map? I\'m getting lost in your eyes.
Does your left eye hurt? Because you\'ve been looking right all day.
I will stop loving you when an apple grows from a mango tree on the 30th of February.
Hi, my name is JDizzle. What\'s yours?
Are you a parking ticket? \'Cause you\'ve got fine written all over you.
Can I have directions…to your heart?
I\'m not drunk, I\'m just intoxicated by YOU.
Your body is 65% water and I\'m thirsty.
Have you been to the doctor lately? Cause I think you\'re lacking some Vitamin Me.
Forget about Spiderman, Superman, and Batman. I\'ll be your man.
Can I follow you home? Cause my parents always told me to follow my dreams.
For a moment I thought I had died and gone to heaven. Now I see that I am very much alive, and heaven has been brought to me.
Was your dad a boxer? Cause you\'re a knockout!
Damn, if being sexy was a crime, you\'d be guilty as charged!
I thought happiness started with an H. Why does mine start with U?
Do you work at Starbucks? Because I like you a latte.
Are you a banana? Because I find you a-peeling
Did you read Dr. Seuss as a kid? Because green eggs and…damn!
When we have each other, everything else is just background noise.
Smoking is hazardous to your health…and baby, you\'re killing me!
There isn\'t a word in the dictionary for how good you look.
Excuse me, but I think I dropped something - my jaw.
Are you a campfire? Cause you are hot and I want s\'more.
Of all the beautiful curves on your body, your smile is my favorite.
I\'m no organ donor but I\'d be happy to give you my heart.
Hershey\'s makes millions of kisses a day…all I\'m asking for is one from you.
Life without you would be like a broken pencil…pointless.
Kiss me if I\'m wrong, but dinosaurs still exist, right?
If nothing lasts forever, will you be my nothing?
I wonder what stories my heart would tell if you pressed your ear to my chest.
I didn\'t know that angels could fly so low!
What\'s on the menu? Me-n-U!
People call me John, but you can call me tonight.
Let\'s make like a fabric softener and \'Snuggle.
Were you arrested earlier? It\'s gotta be illegal to look that good.
You are the reason men fall in love.
Damn girl, you have more curves than a race track.
I hope there\'s a fire truck nearby, cause you\'re smokin\'!
Even if there wasn\'t gravity on earth, I\'d still fall for you.
Hello. Cupid called. He says to tell you that he needs my heart back.

resources.string:
this is a highly experimental feature to allow you to set your own custom contextual headers for your systemui notification shade based on pre-made zip files shared by themers. a soft reboot is required for the system to take your changes as we are modifying the actual apk installed on your phone.

don't forget to enable contextual headers (non-poly/hd) in your rom's settings! if headers aren't set after a soft reboot, clear your systemui cache!
information about the selected header pack
this is a highly experimental feature to allow you to set your own custom notification headers for your systemui notification shade.
options available before choosing a picture:
Click here to soft reboot after all modifications
Woah there, your cache is currently empty! Please do a reboot first! If you believe this is wrong, try to rebuild your entire cache.

this is a highly experimental feature to hotswap your accent colors at runtime (meaning that a full reboot isn't necessary and will not require creating and installing a new APK file)

this has no side effects except battery stats force closing, so to regain battery stats again just install the theme again.you may need to clear out your recents after performing the color swap.
This feature disables you from enabling both SystemUI restart and Hot Reboot. Disable Hot Reboot to switch to SystemUI Restart
click here to change colors for akZent
Please install dark material // akZent before using!
click here to change colors for blakZent
Please install blacked out // blakZent before using!
click here to change colors for projekt // klar
here you have a collection of useful tweaks that you could use if you are encountering issues, or just felt like doing some sunday afternoon cleaning on your phone.\n
rebuild all themes installed on the device

ever wondered how far devs could go with the Layers Theme Engine? we challenged ourselves to reinvent the wheel, so we created an app to house all our tweaks in an all-in-one package.\n\nhowever this app may not work on all devices, so if you see an unsupported message above in red, do not attempt to run this app unless you are ready to be a guinea pig :)
, welcome back to the dashboard beta program!
Please grant dashboard storage permissions or the app will not function properly!
Unable to contact the server! Check your internet connection.
Invalid drawable %1$s, the developer needs to fix this in /res/xml/drawable.xml and /assets/drawable.xml.
